column2: "This is, the inside of the Mothership? Somehow... it feels strangely familiar, but..."
"I've been waiting, you two."
"We have come so far, and the end is in sight. This will be the final request from me to you."
"Go to the core of the Mothership. In there, ...me... The \"me\" in there..."
"Xion!"
"...So the time has come, Xion. The time that we have been waiting for."
"It's been long... oh so long... And now, I can finally... understand everything about you."
"Chief, preparations are complete."
"Ah, is that so? Good work."
"No, the chief's wish is our command! With this, we too, can finally become Photoners!"
"Right."
"And with this, you're dismissed."
"Yes, that's right. This \"tree\" doesn't just need to prune it's branches. There are pests, too."
"Yes, everything else is no longer needed. As long as I have you... Just you, alone."
"These unnecessary \"branches\" and \"pests\" can simply be left to rot. You think so too, don't you? Xion?"
"Xion, where are you?! Where did you go?!?"
"...You two, can you hear me?"
"Eh? You are...?"
"Xion's brother, or so they say. I don't have time to explain: They've already begun."
"Following the plan wasn't a very good idea to begin with. After all, they're faster than we expected."
"Be careful, both of you. You don't know what the enemy is up to anymore. You could expect anything at this point..."
"Hostile species have invaded the Mothership."
"I repeat: hostile species have invaded the Mothership."
"All ARKS members please standby for info on the en... Eh, wha-?"
"...ARKS, do you copy? This is the first of the Council of Six, Regius speaking."
"Due to the gravity of the situation, it has become imperative that I contact everyone."
"Panic is inevitable, so I shall be briefing."
"...Firstly, one target has been confirmed to have made contact with an external organization."
"This contact has occurred on more than one occasion."
"We have also found traces of Support Partner hacking."
"...On top of that, this target has also been confirmed to have conversed with Darkers capable of speech."
"And has been known to have not engaged Darkers, which are kill-on-sight."
"Also, the target is accompanied by an unconfirmed and unregistered person, who spied on the ARKS from within."
"Of course, I must acknowledge that this person has made incredible contributions to the ARKS."
"...In spite of that, this person is an enemy to the ARKS... as we have judged."
"...I repeat. We ARKS... have made our decision."
"...As the First of the Six, Regius, I hereby... Declare this as an Avis:"
"The traitor sabotaging the ARKS..."
"<%me> must be obliterated."
"Hilda... I'll leave the rest to you."
"...Attention all ARKS members: By the Avis, an order to obliterate a target has been issued."
"The enemy of all man, of all ARKS, and the enemy of the Oracle. That target is..."
"The target has invaded the Mothership. ARKS members organize and prepare for pursuit... Over and out!"
"...We've been had. Now it makes sense why we have not been intercepted until now."
"So you've been feigning ignorance of our existence for this moment all along, Luther...!"
"...I apologize. The situation is..."
"I thought he only had Darkers and clones at his fingertips, but for the entirety of ARKS..."
"Everything will be okay... <%me> didn't do anything wrong."
"<%me> helps everyone, saving me as well and even now, for the sake of another, stands firm and spares no effort."
"That's why... Come, <%me>. Let's move, onwards."
"...That's... right. It's as she says. Time is ticking."
"I, too, beg of you, <%me>. Go to where Xion resides."
"I, too, will back you up with everything I have."
"Researcher A"
"Researcher B"
